page1: ^Putting the word out to all deputies. Folks have been riled up something awful as of late, come crying to me about every bump in the night.
^Time to time, folk claim to see rail security yanking a worker off the line. Some of them go on about monsters or some such that they seen outside of town.

^So, if you ain't heard from the Overseer, let me be clear: DO NOT INTERVENE. There are bigger things happening than you or I would care to know about. And trust me, if you go digging your noses into it, it won't be them that do you in.
